metadata.dc:author: Pons Rocher, F
Arroyo Domingo, M
López Martínez, R
Dalmau Galofre, J
Mompo Romero, L
metadata.dc:description: The aim of this work is to highlight the significance on features more frequent of the troubles of the balance and vestibular system in our environment. Also we present a statistic about the symptomatology, on the results of vestibular examination and the diagnoses of a series of patients, of all ages, suffering vertigo, and studied in our department.
metadata.dc:title: Valor de la clínica y de la exploración vestibular en el paciente vertiginoso.
[The value of the clinical picture and vestibular exploration in the vertiginous patient].
